# What .green[my] big data is like (1): with an API

.pull-left[

.center[### Easier with API]

```{r, eval=F, echo=T}
masterlist1 <- data.frame()

##############

for (I in 1:500){
  url_jsonlist <- paste0("http://kobis.or.kr/kobisopenapi/webservice/rest/people/searchPeopleList.json?NOKEYSHOWN", I ,"")

  temp1 <- as.data.frame(fromJSON(url_jsonlist))
  masterlist1 <- plyr::rbind.fill(masterlist1, temp1)
  Sys.sleep(1)
}
```

  html_elements(".petitionsView_title") %>%
  html_text()
#  ...

)
}
